Scorponok


   Scorponok quickly answered the question Allitron asked Megatron, 
"you would gain an ally in this  war and if you ever need to run we 
could house you for a little while, and if you don't allied with us, 
then we might just have to kill you." Scorponok says all this then 
adds a nervous laugh. "It would be the best for everyone, except for 
our enemys, if we join forces." Scorponok looks over to Darkmouse and 
gives a nervous grin.
